channel.title: Mopar fucking server status page
channel.description:
This isn't a rant really. I just want you people to get informed.
WHEN YOUR FUCKING SERVER IS POSTED LIKE 13 FUCKING TIMES NO ONE IS GOING TO GO TO IT!!
I one of the few.. well the only one that doesnt fucking abuse the server status page! moparscape would be better if you just fucking got rid of it !!!
Ban the ports 3112 3128 3451 7462
And alot more
Ban all the ports but
5555 43594
And mopar server status page would be awesome!
THANK YOU!!
Runer queen

item.title: Mopar fucking server status page
item.dc:creator: @THELUKESTA THELUKESTA
item.description:
@THELUKESTA wrote:

omg totaly i remember when the server status screen was helpful i think the voting system is good because the server uptime dosent really work anyway >.<

Read full topic

item.title: Mopar fucking server status page
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Lol the only one? With the new way mitb has the status page, & all the testing I do turning my server off, my Server is on just about the last page (around 20 out of 21), on the status page, and still has about 40+ players on at peak times.

Anyways, I agree, I hate seeing that, and I think he should add a vote system for servers, and base the lineup of the servers on the amount of votes, and put it back to just 1 page instead of multiple. (Just my opinion)

Read full topic
